Tool

NameImport Building Sketches from CityGML
ID21
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2014

Description

This tool facilitates the import of building sketches using a CityGML based file format, that is commonly used by German land surveying offices and geoinformation distributors.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Output
BuildingsShapes (output)BUILDINGS
Options
FilesFile pathFILES
Check for Building PartsBooleanPARTSDefault: 1
